What is Peer Tutoring?       Watch a tutoring session!           WE are: Current UIC French, German, Italian, and Spanish students who love languages.      We know what your UIC language classes are like–we can help you figure out how to enjoy them and do well.  As UIC language students ourselves, we aim to…   Share learning strategies that have worked for us  Help you develop problem-solving skills that help in language classes and all classes  Provide another way for you to connect with your instructor  Show you that learning languages at UIC can be really fun!        YOU are: a UIC student in a French, German, Spanish, or Italian BLP course (101, 102, 103, 104) who...       Has questions about grammar, reading, writing, speaking, homework (online and on paper)  Wants tips on study strategies for our UIC language classes  Feels more comfortable talking to another student   For a SCHEDULE of French, German, Italian, Spanish tutoring click below.       Peer Tutoring Schedule      Visit us on Instagram!   Load More... Follow on Instagram           Peer Tutoring           What is Peer Tutoring? See if peer tutoring is right for you!      For Students  Click here for tips and resources to enhance your language learning experience!      All About LCLC Peer Tutoring  Find out more about our tutors and our Peer Tutoring program, and spread the word to your students and colleagues!      Peer Tutoring Schedules  Find schedules for French, German, Italian, and Spanish peer tutoring times in GH 305 and GH 308.
